label: Komai, Tomoyuki.  2016. Reappraisal of the two axiid genera Manaxius Kensley, 2003 and Calaxidium Sakai, 2014, and description of a new species of Calaxius Sakai & de Saint  Laurent, 1989 from French Polynesia, Southwest Pacific  (Crustacea: Decapoda: Axiidea). Zootaxa 4098(3): 498–510.
value: Komai, Tomoyuki.  2016. Reappraisal of the two axiid genera Manaxius Kensley, 2003 and Calaxidium Sakai, 2014, and description of a new species of Calaxius Sakai & de Saint  Laurent, 1989 from French Polynesia, Southwest Pacific  (Crustacea: Decapoda: Axiidea). Zootaxa 4098(3): 498–510.
title: Reappraisal of the two axiid genera Manaxius Kensley, 2003 and Calaxidium Sakai, 2014, and description of a new species of Calaxius Sakai & de Saint Laurent, 1989 from French Polynesia, Southwest Pacific (Crustacea: Decapoda: Axiidea)
